bill_title: Honoring the Madison High School Boys Basketball Team for its 2014 Boys State A Basketball Championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Madison High School Boys Basketball Team for its 2014 Boys State A Basketball Championship. WHEREAS, the Madison Bulldogs Boys Basketball Team finished the season with a 25-0 overall record; and WHEREAS, the team, coached by head coach Michael Ricke and assistant coaches Ross Huska and Mike Materese, demonstrated incredible discipline and athletic talent with their impressive winning record; and WHEREAS, the players on the team, Preston Nordling, Reid Guse, TraeVandeBerg, Heith Williams, Tayler Anderson, Andrew Fiegen, Hunter Robson, Jacob Leighton, Rush Milne, Danny Klosterman, Carter Kasuske, Jordan Kisor, Jacob Giles, Dallas Fernau, Mason Hemmer, Jordan Unterbrunner, showed great team work and sportsmanship in their season; and WHEREAS, the Bulldogs secured the championship with a win over the Sisseton Redmen in a 52-48 victory: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2014 Madison Bulldogs Boys State A Basketball Team be honored for their outstanding 2014 season and winning the State A Championship.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Madison High School Boys Basketball Team for its 2014 Boys State A Basketball Championship. WHEREAS, the Madison Bulldogs Boys Basketball Team finished the season with a 25-0 overall record; and WHEREAS, the team, coached by head coach Michael Ricke and assistant coaches Ross Huska and Mike Materese, demonstrated incredible discipline and athletic talent with their impressive winning record; and WHEREAS, the players on the team, Preston Nordling, Reid Guse, TraeVandeBerg, Heith Williams, Tayler Anderson, Andrew Fiegen, Hunter Robson, Jacob Leighton, Rush Milne, Danny Klosterman, Carter Kasuske, Jordan Kisor, Jacob Giles, Dallas Fernau, Mason Hemmer, Jordan Unterbrunner, showed great team work and sportsmanship in their season; and WHEREAS, the Bulldogs secured the championship with a win over the Sisseton Redmen in a 52-48 victory: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2014 Madison Bulldogs Boys State A Basketball Team be honored for their outstanding 2014 season and winning the State A Championship. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
